bibl.title: The Abi'or Cave - Greek and Aramaic Papyri.
bibl.note: Presentation of the papyri (28 Aramaic and 5 Greek documents, 26 Greek fragments) discovered in a mountain cave opposite the plain of Jericho in the course of the springs and summers of 1986 and 1993.

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I

bibl.seg: COHEN Nahum, The Abi'or Cave - Greek and Aramaic Papyri.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I (Firenze, 2001) pp. 251-254 et pll. IX-X n./bl. et coul.

Presentation of the papyri (28 Aramaic and 5 Greek documents, 26 Greek fragments) discovered in a mountain cave opposite the plain of Jericho in the course of the springs and summers of 1986 and 1993.
